text: Fontrieu is a commune. It is in Occitanie in the Tarn department in south France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2016 and consists of the former communes of Castelnau-de-Brassac (the seat), Ferrières and Le Margnès.Arrêté préfectoral 18 November 2015 == References == Category:2016 establishments in France Category:Communes in Tarn
title: Fontrieu
